alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 23 at 3:22PM MST until August 23 at 7:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 630 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 322 PM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 0.75 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Diamond M Ranch, Valentine and Peach Springs. - This includes the following roads... Highway 93 in Mohave County between mile markers 92 and 101. Interstate 40 in Arizona between mile markers 71 and 92. Route 66 between mile markers 81 and 108. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
